title: TOP LANE TIER LIST??
body:
Do not include hec,shy,riven,gnar or irelia, yes i know there all good i just dont like them

Thinking olaf due to that r buff (Move speed!)

Maybe even trundle?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=nauuMvkO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-14T11:15:27.149+0000)
>
> http://lmgtfy.com/?q=League+of+Legends+Tier+lists

Ty for 5.8 tier list, there isnt any yet.. kinda asked for 5.9 in a way

well;
a) 5.9 hasn't started.
b) The changes mean Hecarim goes down, (top nerf) Olaf goes up (slightly), Renekton up, Riven is dead, Trundle goes up.

That's top lane specific ones anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=nauuMvkO,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-05-14T17:22:32.505+0000)
>

> b) The changes mean Hecarim goes down, (top nerf) Olaf goes up (slightly), Renekton up, Riven is dead, Trundle goes up.

Lol it did when this posts was made, riven isnt ded lol
her ult change and movement speed nerf are killing her, and my post was made while the server was down not during 5.9 :P

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=nauuMvkO,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-15T05:49:41.355+0000)
>
> her ult change and movement speed nerf are killing her, and my post was made while the server was down not during 5.9 :P

Oh mine doesnt seem to be >_<

 its not that serious shes still kinda good lol, better then most top laners (Olaf qq )

You know the ones you listed NOT to include are probably some of the best top laner for Solo Q atm right? Like... Probably THE best. But if we're going with champions that AREN'T those ones. Trundle, Maokai and Sion. 

Trundle is really good for this current meta since he makes big tanks not so big tanks.

Maokai is solid and reliable and can be picked into basically any comp.

Sion is just a big fucking tank with lots of CC.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=nauuMvkO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-14T09:57:58.612+0000)
